query:
-- Aprovar o ciclo 1
UPDATE evaluationCycles 
SET status = 'ativo', 
    approvedAt = NOW(),
    approvedBy = 1,
    updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE id = 1;

-- Verificar o ciclo atualizado
SELECT id, name, status, startDate, endDate, approvedAt, approvedBy 
FROM evaluationCycles 
WHERE id = 1;
